title: DecoratedSignature
description:
DecoratedSignature is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct DecoratedSignature { SignatureHint hint;  // last 4 bytes of the public key, used as a hint Signature signature; // actual signature }; ```

Signature.description:
Signature is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef opaque Signature<64>; ```
